metadata.Title: CVE-2019-19308 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - low.
metadata.Description: In text_to_glyphs in sushi-font-widget.c in gnome-font-viewer 3.34.0, there is a NULL pointer dereference while parsing a TTF font file that lacks a name section (due to a g_strconcat call that returns NULL).

criterions.comment: gnome-font-viewer package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
gnome-sushi: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
